metadata.title: CVE-2022-3902 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from9.3 before 15.4.6, all versions starting from 15.5 before 15.5.5, allversions starting from 15.6 before 15.6.1. It was possible for a projectmaintainer to unmask webhook secret tokens by reviewing the logs aftertesting webhooks.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
